article_title: To Discuss Labour Economics and The Minimum Wage For A Moment

article_metadata.author: Tim Worstall

og.description: One of the readers here, Tim Freestone (@Freestone14) wants to take me to task over what he perceives is my misunderstanding of labour economics. He's written a rather longer piece than I can answer in tweets, so why not explain matters here? What follows is Freestone's missive along with my [...]
